name: Quadristorage
description:
Arrow keys (or WASD or ZQSD) to move and send the box.

Point with the mouse to decide where to send the box.

You can warp (for example, if you go completely to the left, you will come back to the right)

Try to align 3 identical boxes to make a raw in the 4 storages.

Good luck

Made for the Trijam 181 - Storage Management
